actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to encourage the conclusion of a Convention for the Establishment of a South Pacific Regional Fisheries Organization to which the United States would become a party.

summary.text: Encourages the executive branch to conclude a Convention for the Establishment of a South Pacific Regional Fisheries Organization, by whatever diplomatic means are necessary, including the involvement of the highest levels of the United States Government.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to encourage the conclusion of a Convention for the Establishment of a South Pacific Regional Fisheries Organization to which the United States would become a party.
